The best time of year to visit Zagreb in Croatia

Zagreb has an oceanic climate. Summers are hot and dry, winters are cold and it can even snow. The average maximum winter temperature is around 4°C. In summer it's around 26°C. Starting the end of May the temperatures starts rising. Rain is seen throughout the year with autumn as the wettest season.

During the months of May and September you are most likely to experience good weather with pleasant average temperatures that fall between 20°C and 26°C.

Other facts from our historical weather data:

Which is the warmest month in Zagreb?

July has an average maximum temperature of 29°C and is the warmest month of the year.

Which is the coldest month in Zagreb?

The coldest month is January with an average maximum temperature of 6°C.

Which is the wettest month in Zagreb?

September tops the wettest month list with 102 mm of rainfall.

Which is the driest month in Zagreb?

January is the driest month with 53 mm of precipitation.

Which is the sunniest month in Zagreb?

July is the sunniest month with an average of 280 hours of sunshine.
